column1: “(v) That in any event, the decision of the Respondent fixing a “Reasonable
Price  Formula”  has  been  made  without  giving  the  Petitioner  or
members  an  opportunity  of  being  heard  thus  violating  the  fundamental
legal principle of audi alteram partem”.
